constantValues: A container for slots of time that may be available for booking appointments.

members.name: active

constantValues: Whether this schedule record is in active use, or should not be used (such as was entered in error).

members.description: Whether this schedule record is in active use, or should not be used (such as was entered in error).

foreignKeyAttribute.name: actorDeviceId

constantValues: This resource identifies an instance or a type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: This resource identifies an instance or a type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: actorHealthCareServiceId

constantValues: The details of a healthcare service available at a location.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The details of a healthcare service available at a location.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: actorLocationId

constantValues: Details and position information for a physical place where services are provided and resources and participants may be stored, found, contained or accommodated.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Details and position information for a physical place where services are provided and resources and participants may be stored, found, contained or accommodated.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: actorPatientId

constantValues: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: actorPractitionerId

constantValues: A person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: actorPractitionerRoleId

constantValues: A specific set of Roles/Locations/specialties/services that a practitioner may perform at an organization for a period of time.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A specific set of Roles/Locations/specialties/services that a practitioner may perform at an organization for a period of time.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: actorRelatedPersonId

constantValues: Information about a person that is involved in the care for a patient, but who is not the target of healthcare, nor has a formal responsibility in the care process.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Information about a person that is involved in the care for a patient, but who is not the target of healthcare, nor has a formal responsibility in the care process.

members.name: comment

constantValues: Comments on the availability to describe any extended information. Such as custom constraints on the slots that may be associated.

members.description: Comments on the availability to describe any extended information. Such as custom constraints on the slots that may be associated.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: planningHorizonEndDateTime

constantValues: The period End date of time that the slots that are attached to this Schedule resource cover (even if none exist).

members.description: The period End date of time that the slots that are attached to this Schedule resource cover (even if none exist).

members.name: planningHorizonStartDateTime

constantValues: The period of time that the slots that are attached to this Schedule resource cover (even if none exist). These cover the amount of time that an organization's planning horizon.

members.description: The period of time that the slots that are attached to this Schedule resource cover (even if none exist). These cover the amount of time that an organization's planning horizon.

members.name: scheduleNumber

constantValues: A container for slots of time that may be available for booking appointments.

members.description: A container for slots of time that may be available for booking appointments.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: serviceCategoryId

constantValues: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment.
